name: GG3
description: GG3 pioneers community engagement through first-to-market AI Agents Swarm, learning from major platforms including X, YouTube, Discord, Telegram, Steam and Twitch. Analyzing 100,000+ Steam games and user behavior data, it bridges Web2 and Web3 via personalized, AI-driven experiences. Powered by GGX, offering AI community management, viral content generation & 24/7 intelligent moderation for 110,000+ active users. Backed by GamerHash AI and Aethir, Hacken-audited, BSC Foundation support.
